$(c:/ftbquests open_book 65FD2E8334B1DF1C)&c$(l)---> Open Quest Page <--- $(/c)$(br)&r&eThe &eCodex&r is an accessory/gear item that you can equip, which starts dropping at level 50. The &eCodex&r provides powerful stats to the player depending on the diversity of gear equipped.

The bottom lists the requirements, such as: having 2 &cUniques&r, 1 piece of Normal gear (&7Common&r -> &5Mythic&r), and 2 &eRunewords&r equipped.
Depending on the number of these you have equipped, the &eCodex&r provides more stats which can be seen in the tooltip.
